overview: What happens when the music of Céline Dion makes sweet Canadian love with the eleven-time Oscar®-winning film Titanic? You get TITANIQUE, an upcoming musical celebration that turns one of the greatest love stories of all time into a hysterical and joyful slay-fest.  Streamed live from New York City’s Le Poisson Rouge, our story reveals what really happened to Jack and Rose on that fateful night, as told by Céline Dion (who hijacks a Titanic Museum tour and recharts the course of Titanic’s beloved moments). The evening will feature a powerhouse cast performing 15+ of Céline’s most iconic hits, including “My Heart Will Go On,” “It’s All Coming Back To Me Now,” and “All By Myself.”  Girlfriends, it’s time to feel joy again. It’s time to feel love again. It’s time to strap on your life vest and never let go!  We’ll see you on the Ship of Dreams.
title: Titanique: The Maiden Voyage Concert
